name: Discount Report
query:
SELECT 
    S.name AS "Invoice:Link/Sales Invoice:140",
    S.posting_date AS "Date:Date:110",
    S.patient AS "Patient:Data:120",
    S.patient_name AS "Patient Name:Data:200",
    S.ref_practitioner as "Doctor:Data:200",
    S.so_type as "Cost Center",
    S.total AS "Total:Currency:100",
    S.discount_amount AS "Discount:Currency:100",
    S.total - S.discount_amount AS "Net Pay:Currency:100",
    CASE WHEN S.comment = 'NO REMARKS' THEN '' ELSE S.comment END AS "Remark:Data:200",
    SIP.account AS "Account:Data:200" ,
    S.owner as "User:Data:200"
FROM 
    `tabSales Invoice` S
LEFT JOIN 
    `tabSales Invoice Payment` SIP ON S.name = SIP.parent
WHERE 
    S.posting_date BETWEEN %(from)s AND %(to)s 
    AND S.docstatus = 1  and S.discount_amount >0
GROUP BY 
    S.name;
